dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1135 : To reauthorize the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation program.

section.header: Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation program reauthorized
section.text: Section 507(d)(2) of the Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 (54 U.S.C. 302101 note) is amended by striking the period at the end and inserting and each of fiscal years 2018 through 2024..

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives June 27, 2017.
